description: Gets information about the specified thing. Requires permission to access the DescribeThing action.

nested_items.name: defaultClientId
nested_items.description: The default MQTT client ID. For a typical device, the thing name is also used as the default MQTT client ID. Although we don't require a mapping between a thing's registry name and its use of MQTT client IDs, certificates, or shadow state, we recommend that you choose a thing name and use it as the MQTT client ID for the registry and the Device Shadow service.

nested_items.name: thingId
nested_items.description: The ID of the thing to describe.

nested_items.name: thingArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the thing to describe.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The current version of the thing record in the registry.

nested_items.name: billingGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the billing group the thing belongs to.
